description: Official corporate website for Pfizer Inc., providing comprehensive information about the company's products, research initiatives, investor relations, corporate responsibility, and career opportunities.

features.name: Investor Dashboard
features.description: Real-time stock information and financial performance metrics for investors.

features.name: Clinical Trials Finder
features.description: Search tool for ongoing clinical trials with filtering by condition, location, and phase.

features.name: Career Portal
features.description: Job search and application system with personalized job recommendations.

features.name: Media Resource Center
features.description: Downloadable press releases, images, and video content for media professionals.

legalContent.text: Comprehensive privacy policy detailing how Pfizer collects, processes, and protects visitor data in compliance with GDPR, CCPA, and other data protection regulations.
Standard terms governing use of the website, intellectual property rights, disclaimers, and limitations of liability.
Detailed information about cookies used on the website including types, purposes, and cookie management options.

disclaimers.siteDisclaimerText: Information on this website is provided for informational purposes only and is not meant to substitute for the advice provided by your own physician or other medical professional.
disclaimers.regionLockNotice: Some content may not be available in all regions due to regulatory requirements.

description: Official corporate website for Novartis AG, showcasing the company's pharmaceutical products, research and development initiatives, corporate strategy, sustainability efforts, and investor information.

features.name: Annual Report Interactive Tool
features.description: Interactive visualization of financial data and corporate performance metrics.

features.name: R&D Pipeline Visualizer
features.description: Interactive visualization of drug development pipeline with filtering by therapeutic area and development phase.

features.name: Global Impact Map
features.description: Interactive map showing Novartis research facilities, manufacturing sites, and access to medicine initiatives worldwide.

features.name: Media Resource Hub
features.description: Centralized repository of press releases, images, videos, and fact sheets for media professionals.

legalContent.text: Comprehensive privacy notice describing data collection practices, processing purposes, data subject rights, and compliance with global privacy regulations.
Legal agreement governing website usage, including intellectual property provisions, disclaimer of warranties, and limitations of liability.
Explanation of cookies used on the website, including categories, purposes, third-party cookies, and user control options.

disclaimers.siteDisclaimerText: The information on this website is not intended to provide medical advice. Consult a qualified healthcare professional for medical advice, diagnosis or treatment.
disclaimers.regionLockNotice: Product information may vary by country. Visitors should refer to the Novartis website for their country for information specific to their location.

description: Information about AstraZeneca's clinical trials for healthcare professionals and patients. This specialized portal provides details on ongoing clinical trials, eligibility criteria, research findings, and resources for trial participants.

features.name: Clinical Trial Finder
features.description: Advanced search tool allowing patients and HCPs to find relevant trials by condition, location, and phase.

features.name: Patient Resource Center
features.description: Educational resources and support materials for patients considering or participating in clinical trials.

features.name: HCP Trial Dashboard
features.description: Specialized portal for healthcare providers with detailed trial protocols and enrollment procedures.

features.name: Trial Results Database
features.description: Searchable repository of published trial results with visualizations and downloadable datasets.

legalContent.text: Detailed privacy notice covering personal data collection practices for clinical trial participants, website visitors, and healthcare professionals.
Terms governing the use of the clinical trials website, including access restrictions for healthcare professionals and disclaimers regarding medical information.
Policy detailing cookie usage across the clinical trials portal, including functional, performance, and targeting cookies.
Specialized data protection statement for clinical trial participants describing how their personal and health data is processed during trials.

disclaimers.siteDisclaimerText: The information on this website is intended for informational purposes only and should not be used as a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis or treatment.
disclaimers.regionLockNotice: Clinical trial availability varies by region. Not all trials are available in all countries or locations.
